books.author: by Patricia Briggs
books.description: The ex-wife of Adam, mate of the shape shifter Mercy Thompson, wants him back.
books.name: NIGHT BROKEN

books.author: by Sylvia Day
books.description: Gianna Rossi and Jackson Rutledge navigate a cutthroat business world and its inner circle of glamour, sex and privilege.
books.name: AFTERSHOCK

books.author: by Danielle Steel
books.description: Two C.E.O.s — one a man, the other a woman — face very different challenges.
books.name: POWER PLAY

books.author: by Jeffrey Archer
books.description: The Clifton Chronicles reach the 1960s in the fourth volume of the series.
books.name: BE CAREFUL WHAT YOU WISH FOR

books.author: by C. J. Box
books.description: Joe Pickett, a Wyoming game warden and special assistant to the governor, investigates a mysterious wealthy rancher.
books.name: STONE COLD

books.author: by Donna Tartt
books.description: A painting smuggled out of the Metropolitan Museum of Art after a bombing becomes a boy’s prize, guilt and burden.
books.name: THE GOLDFINCH

books.author: by Sue Monk Kidd
books.description: The relationship between a wealthy Charleston girl, Sarah Grimké, who will grow up to become a prominent abolitionist, and the slave she is given for her 11th birthday.
books.name: THE INVENTION OF WINGS

books.author: by Liane Moriarty
books.description: A woman’s life is upended when she discovers a letter from her husband she was not meant to read.
books.name: THE HUSBAND'S SECRET

books.author: by Christina Baker Kline
books.description: A historical novel about orphans swept off the streets of New York and sent to the Midwest in the 1920s.
books.name: ORPHAN TRAIN

books.author: by John Grisham
books.description: A sequel, about race and inheritance, to “A Time to Kill.”
books.name: SYCAMORE ROW

books.author: by Brandon Sanderson
books.description: The second book of the Stormlight Archive fantasy epic, set in the world of Roshar.
books.name: WORDS OF RADIANCE

books.author: by James Patterson and Mark Sullivan
books.description: Jack Morgan and Justine Smith search for a high-powered celebrity couple who have disappeared.
books.name: PRIVATE L.A.

books.author: by Paulo Coelho
books.description: In this fable, a Spanish shepherd boy ventures to Egypt in search of treasure and his destiny. First published in 1993.
books.name: THE ALCHEMIST

books.author: by Janet Evanovich and Lee Goldberg
books.description: Nicolas Fox (a handsome con man) and Kate O’Hare (an F.B.I. agent) team up to steal back a Chinese artifact taken from the Smithsonian.
books.name: THE CHASE

books.author: by Clive Cussler and Justin Scott
books.description: The early-20th-century detective Isaac Bell tracks a wide-ranging international criminal enterprise.
books.name: THE BOOTLEGGER
